bibl.title: Espen S. Ore and Ragnar Jensen, Literalogy: On the Use of Computer Graphics and Photography in Papyrology.
bibl.note: Shows how photographical techniques and display of figures on a computer screen can be used for reconstruction of fragmentary preserved writing in papyrus texts. All examples are drawn from Herculaneum texts.
bibl.seg: Kleve Knut, Espen S. Ore and Ragnar Jensen, Literalogy: On the Use of Computer Graphics and Photography in Papyrology.

Shows how photographical techniques and display of figures on a computer screen can be used for reconstruction of fragmentary preserved writing in papyrus texts. All examples are drawn from Herculaneum texts.
